scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,packages "bun run --filter web dev" "bun run --filter @repo/qa build -- --watch"
scripts.build: bun run --filter @repo/qa build && bun run --filter web build
scripts.lint: bun run --filter './apps/*' lint && bun run --filter './packages/*' lint
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter './apps/*' typecheck && bun run --filter './packages/*' typecheck
scripts.format: bun run --filter './apps/*' format && bun run --filter './packages/*' format
scripts.qa: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run format
